content.webTitle: Engadget live from Nintendo's Wii launch in New York

fields.headline: Engadget live from Nintendo's Wii launch in New York
fields.bodyText: "The word is Toys R Us is stocked with 5,000 7,000 of the dang things for the launch, so there are going to be a lot of people going home happy this evening," says Engadget. Lots of pictures, of somewhat variable quality.
